13705.「あんときは 世話になったな。\n アンタらのおかげで 悪の道から\n 足を洗う:
Thanks for your help back then. Thanks to you,
I was able to step away from the path of evil.

13706.「……ところで アンタ\n 親父の試練で ここまで来たんだろ？\n だとしたら:
By the way... ya came all the way here for
pops' trial, yeah? Ya ain't good enough as
ya are, though.

13707.「親父は かいとうの仮面を装備して\n ここに来いって 言ってなかったか？\n:
Didn't pops tell ya to come here with a
Mugger's Mask equipped? And yet here ya are
without one.

13708.「さいわい ギャスモンのヤツも\n まだ 現れてねえ。サササっと戻って\n かい:
Fortunately, Buntzenberner hasn't shown up
yet. Go back and get yourself a Mugger's Mask.

13710.「……おっ 親父の言いつけどおり\n かいとうの仮面を 装備してきたようだな。:
...Looks like ya got yourself a Mugger's Mask,
just like pops asked.

13711.「あとは ギャスモンとの戦闘中に\n ギャスモンハートを 盗みとってから\n と:
All that's left is to pinch Buntzenberner's
Heart during the battle and then finish him
off.

13714.「あの野郎には 借りがあるからよ\n 本当は この手で 引導を渡してやりてえが…:
I really owe that bastard, and I'd love to pay
him back myself, but... I'll let you take care
of the rest, <cs_pchero>!

13715.「親父を超える 盗賊王……。\n アンタなら なれる！ がんばってくれ！:
If anyone can be a greater master thief than
pops... it's definitely you! Go for it!

13716.「ホウホウホウ……。クックック……。\n 汝ハ ちから二 アフレテイルナ。\n:
HOHOHO... KUKUKU... YOU ARE OVERFLOWING WITH
POWER. HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO JOIN ME?

13717.「……イヤ 答エヲ 待ツコトナド出来ヌ。\n ソレホドマデニ 見事ナ器ヨ……。\:
...I CANNOT WAIT FOR YOUR ANSWER. YOU ARE A
MAGNIFICENT VESSEL... I WANT THAT POWER...

13718.「欲シイ 欲シイ ソノちからガ 欲シイ……！\n<br>\n「コノママ 汝ノ身体:
I WANT IT, I WANT IT, I WANT THAT POWER...!
I WILL POSSESS YOUR BODY!!

13721.「前回は 惜しかったな。\n 今度こそ ギャスモンの野郎を仕留めて\n 試練クリ:
That was a close call last time. Let's finish
off Buntzenberner this time and complete the
trial.

13722.「いいかい？ ヤツに とどめをさす前に\n ちゃんと ギャスモンハートを盗むんだ:
Understand? Ya gotta steal Buntzenberner's
Heart before finishin' him off. Don't forget
it.

13724.「来たぞ！ ヤツだ！\n 今度こそ頼むぜ <cs_pchero>さん！:
Here he comes! You'll get him this time,
<cs_pchero>!

13725.「クックック……。良カッタ。\n モウ 会エナイカト 思ッテイタ……。:
KUKUKU... I'M GLAD YOU CAME. I THOUGHT WE
WOULD NEVER SEE EACH OTHER AGAIN...

13726.「汝ノヨウナ 見事ナ器\n 取リ逃ガスワケニハ イカヌ……。:
I CAN'T ALLOW SUCH A MAGNIFICENT VESSEL TO
ESCAPE...

13727.「欲シイ 欲シイ ソノちからガ 欲シイ……！: I WANT IT, I WANT IT, I WANT THAT POWER...!

13728.「今度コソ 汝ノ身体二\n 憑依シテクレルワァァァァ！！！: THIS TIME, I WILL POSSESS YOUR BODY!!

13730.「我ガ肉体ハ 仮ノモノ……。\n ユエニ 肉体ヲ 何度 滅ボシテモ\n 無駄ダ…:
MY BODY IS TRANSIENT... NO MATTER HOW MANY
TIMES YOU DESTROY IT...

13731.「クックック……。マタ 会オウ。\n スバラシキ器ノ 持チ主ヨ……。:
KUKUKU... I'LL SEE YOU SOON, MY MOST
MAGNIFICENT VESSEL...

13732.「そうか……。ギャスモンハートを盗まないと\n ヤツは 完全に倒せないんだったな:
I see... he can't be completely beaten unless
we steal his heart...

13733.「なあ <cs_pchero>さんよ。\n ここは アンタのウデの見せどころだぜ:
Hey, <cs_pchero>. This is where you're
supposed to show your skills.

13734.「あいつに ぬすむを使って ギャスモンハートを\n 盗んでから とどめをさすんだ:
Use Half-Inch to steal Buntzenberner's Heart,
than finish him off! You can do it! Next time,
for sure!

13735.<cs_pchero>は\nギャスモンハート（だいじなもの）を盗んで\nギャスモ:
<cs_pchero>
stole the Buntzenberner Heart (Key Item) and
put an end to Buntzenberner!

13736.「シ…シマッタ……。\n 我ガ心 奪ワレタカ……。\n コノママデハ…… ウッ…:
N... NOOOO... MY HEART... HAS BEEN STOLEN...
WITHOUT IT... I...

13738.「やったな！ <cs_pchero>さん！\n アンタ やっぱり すげえや！:
Ya did it, <cs_pchero>! Ya really are
amazing!

13739.「……この間までの オレは\n さっきのギャスモンと 同じだった。\n 欲望に負:
...I was just like Buntzenberner before. I
lost sight of myself because of my desires.

13740.「オレは それが 間違っていると思わなかった。\n 盗賊ってのは みんな 自分の:
I thought I couldn't have been wrong. I
thought that all thieves were just driven by
their own greed.

13741.「でもよ。<cs_pchero>さん アンタは違う。\n アンタは 自分のためじ:
But you were different, <cs_pchero>.
You ain't a thief for yourself, but for
savin' and protectin' others.

13742.「親父も きっと\n そうだったんだよな……。: I'm sure pops was the same way...

13743.「さて ギャスモンも いなくなったことだし\n オレは アンタみたいな 盗賊を目:
Now that Buntzenberner is gone, I'm off to
train to become a thief like you.

13744.「じゃあな <cs_pchero>さん。\n 縁があったら また会おうや！:
Later, <cs_pchero>! I'll see ya around
sometime!

13745.「ああ そうだ！ 親父には\n 試練をクリアしたって 報告しとくからよ。\n ち:
Oh yeah. You should let pops know you passed
the trial. Ya better head back to Gatara!

13746.「やれやれ。かなわないね アンタには。: Good grief. There's just no beating you.

13747.「マスク・ド・ムーチョが 用意した試練を\n あっさり こなしちまうなんてさ。:
I can't believe you so easily completed the
trial set by Masc de Mucho himself.

13748.「<pc> アンタは 旅の盗賊だ。\n ひとつの町に とどまらないのも 知ってい:
You're a traveling thief, <pc>. I
know you won't be able to stay in any one town
for too long.

13749.「だから あたいらは\n アンタを 引き止めたりしないよ。\n むしろ アンタの:
That's why we don't want to hold you back. We
want to see more of what you can do.

13750.「……でもね <pc>。\n これだけは 覚えといておくれ。\n アンタは ダル:
...Just don't forget, <pc>. You're
the pride and joy of the Darul Thieves.

13751.「あたいらも いつか アンタに\n 追いつけるよう このガタラを守りながら\n:
We'll keep Gatara safe and keep working on our
skills so we can catch up to you one day.

13752.「ブデチョ…… いや ムーチョさんも\n あたいらに 協力してくれるはずさ。:
Budecho... I mean, Mucho will be helping us
with that.

13753.「いや…… ワシが してやれることは\n もう 何もないだろう。: Nah... there's nothing more I can do for you.

13754.「義の心は 揺らぐことなく\n 若い お前たちに 受け継がれたのだからな。\n:
The spirit of righteousness has been firmly
passed on to you youngsters. Nothing could
make me happier.

13756.「頼りにしてるぞ！ ダルル盗賊団！: I'm counting on you! Darul Thieves!

42167.「それから ギャスモンハートは\n ひとつあれば 充分だ。１個 盗んだら\n ギ:
You only need one Buntzenberner Heart. Once
you've stolen it, you can focus on finishing
off Buntzenberner.

42168.「いいかい？ ギャスモンハートは\n ひとつあれば 充分だ。１個 盗んだら\n:
Got it? You only need one Buntzenberner Heart.
Once you've stolen it, you can focus on
finishing off Buntzenberner.
